SELECT T1.* , T2.USER_NAME RECORD_USER_NAME , T3.STORE_NAME FROM PSB_STORE_PLACE T1 LEFT JOIN SSB_USER T2 ON T1.RECORD_USER_ID = T2.OBJID LEFT JOIN PSB_STORE T3 ON T1.STORE_ID = T3.OBJID
T1.OBJID = #where.OBJID#
T1.STORE_PLACE_NAME LIKE '%' || #where.STORE_PLACE_NAME# || '%'
T1.STORE_PLACE_CODE = #where.STORE_PLACE_CODE#
T1.STORE_ID = #where.STORE_ID#
T1.STORE_ID = #where.STORE_ID#
T1.DELETE_FLAG = #where.DELETE_FLAG#
ORDER BY $OrderString$
ORDER BY T1.OBJID
select t1.OBJID sskey, t1.STORE_NAME ssValue from PSB_STORE t1 where t1.DELETE_FLAG = '0' ORDER BY t1.OBJID

SELECT t1.STORAGE_LOC_CODE sskey,t1.STORAGE_LOC_NAME ssValue FROM (select distinct substr2(storage_loc, 1, 4) STORAGE_LOC_CODE, STORAGE_LOC STORAGE_LOC_NAME from psm_out_stock_main union select distinct substr2(STOR_LOC_FROM, 1, 4) STORAGE_LOC_CODE, STOR_LOC_FROM STORAGE_LOC_NAME from psm_transfer_main ) t1
